content: ईहित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [ईह्-क्त] {@--1@} Wished desired; शिरसीहितः <ls>Ratn. 1. 1.</ls> {@--2@} Attempted, sought, striven for; <ls>Ve. 1. 24.</ls> --तं {@--1@} A wish, desire; {@--2@} Effort, exertion. {@--3@} An undertaking, deed, act; प्रतीयते धातुरिवेहितं फलैः <ls>Ki. 1. 20</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">8. 46</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">11. 43</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">18. 31</ls>; <ls>Śi. 9. 62.</ls>
